lines: The fastest route to greater happiness is giving and volunteering.
author: <Author:0x00007f553ddcf110>

lines: An essential part of a happy, healthy life is being of service to others.
author: <Author:0x00007f553ddbcbf0>

lines: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
author: <Author:0x00007f553de0c178>

lines: Great opportunities to help others seldom come, but small ones surround us every day.
author: <Author:0x00007f553ddf56d0>

lines: If you see something beautiful in someone, speak it!
author: <Author:0x00007f553de47598>

lines: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
author: <Author:0x00007f553de2f628>

lines: I can't think of any better representation of beauty than someone who is unafraid to be herself.
author: <Author:0x00007f553de1c848>

lines: The sign of a beautiful person is that they always see beauty in others.
author: <Author:0x00007f553de6e990>

lines: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
author: <Author:0x00007f553de5ca88>

lines: Be good for something while you live and it is in your power.
author: <Author:0x00007f553dea6250>

lines: The unselfish effort to bring cheer to others will be the beginning of a happier life for ourselves.
author: <Author:0x00007f553de8e830>

lines: As we work to create light for others, we naturally light our own way.
author: <Author:0x00007f553dedc530>

lines: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
author: <Author:0x00007f553dec5b50>

lines: Those who are happiest are those who do the most for others.
author: <Author:0x00007f553df17158>

lines: Peace begins with a smile.
author: <Author:0x00007f553df04e90>

lines: Choose love and peace will follow. Choose peace and love will follow.
author: <Author:0x00007f553dee6d50>

lines: Peace, like charity, begins at home.
author: <Author:0x00007f553df3cc78>

lines: When we have peace in our hearts and minds, we draw peace into our lives.
author: <Author:0x00007f553df269f0>

lines: Inner peace doesn’t come from getting what we want, but from remembering who we are.
author: <Author:0x00007f553df6fda8>

lines: One child, one teacher, one book, one pen can change the world.
author: <Author:0x00007f553df57e60>

lines: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
author: <Author:0x00007f553dfb9ca0>

lines: Children must be taught how to think, not what to think.
author: <Author:0x00007f553df94ba8>

lines: The best teachers are those who show you where to look but don’t tell you what to see.
author: <Author:0x00007f553df7ceb8>

lines: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
author: <Author:0x00007f553dfd9168>

lines: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you pales in comparison to what lies inside you.
author: <Author:0x00007f553dfc2a08>

lines: Every small positive change we make in ourselves repays us in confidence in the future.
author: <Author:0x00007f553e01c198>

lines: Live from the heart of yourself. Seek to be whole, not perfect.
author: <Author:0x00007f553e0068e8>

lines: You have no control over other people's taste, so focus on staying true to your own.
author: <Author:0x00007f553e054a98>

lines: Confidence comes not from always being right, but from not fearing to be wrong.
author: <Author:0x00007f553e03e6a8>

lines: We all come from different paths in life but we can find common ground.
author: <Author:0x00007f553d357408>

lines: We all live with the objective of being happy; our lives are all different and yet the same.
author: <Author:0x00007f553e06f5a0>

lines: We must seek, above all, a world of peace; a world in which peoples dwell together in mutual respect and work together in mutual regard.
author: <Author:0x00007f553e05d378>

lines: By mutual respect, understanding and with good will we can find acceptable solutions to any problems which exist or may arise between us.
author: <Author:0x00007f553e0c6e18>
